task.shortdesc: This section contains the information about the installation of automation rule plugin in JIRA.

context.p: Automation rules are used to perform actions in your service project based on specific triggers and conditions.
Do the following steps to install the automation rule plugin in JIRA server.

step.cmd: Go to settings on the the top right corner in the menu bar, then select the manage apps.
Search for Automation Rules in the market place.
Install the automation rule plugin, You can create the rules to communicate between the ICD and JIRA.

substep.cmd: You can set an automation rule that alerts an agent when a high priority issue is created or when the customer comment to reopen the service project request again.
